|accessdate=2009-11-18}}</ref> She appeared in the lead role of the Crime thriller film [[The Factory (film)|The Factory]].<ref>[http://www.bloody-disgusting.com/news/20635 First Images from John Cusack Thriller 'The Factory'!]</ref>
  +   +
=== Television ===
  +
Sampson's other appearances include ''[[Reaper (TV series)|Reaper]]'', ''[[Supernatural (TV series)|Supernatural]]'', ''[[The Last Kiss]]'', ''[[Footsteps (2003 film)|Footsteps]]'', ''[[Proof of Lies]]'', ''[[Pretty Dead Flowers]]'' and ''[[Swamp Devil]] 1 & 2''. She also portrayed Sandra MacLaren in ''[[Rumours (TV series)|Rumours]]''.
  +   +
Sampson appeared in Season 3 of ''Supernatural'' as the character Lisa Braedon ( guest star), she appeared in the episode The Kids Are Alright. She reprised the role for the episode Dream a Little Dream of Me after showrunner Eric Kripke could not get the rights to use the character Jason Voorhes.
  +   +
Sampson's character was brought back in Season 5 at the last minute due to the show being renewed for a sixth season, she appeared in the episode 99 problems and Swan Song. Sampson has thus far appeared in 6 episodes of the current series of the show. She is set to appear in the episode Mannequin 3 : The Reckoning alongside Jensen Ackles, Jared Padelicki and Nicholas Elia.
  +   +
Sampson's reprisal of the role of '' Lisa Braedon'' has been met by criticism from many fans of Supernatural, many have called her reintroduction to the show as '' contrived'' many fans have also stated that the storyline does not fit into the overall theme of the show as the show is about two brothers hunting and not about domestic dramas.
  +   +
It is thought that Sampson will make her final appearance in Episode 14 of the show and will not return.
